title: The Dark Secrets of Rebecca Marie
description: This story is about a child growing up in a world of abuse that led her to become an ongoing victim as an adult. Rebecca falls to the stereotypical battered-wife syndrome. She struggles to survive in world of starvation, brutal beatings, and humiliation that excels to rape and entrapment. You will come away from this feeling the human spirit's ability to survive both physically and emotionally. This book has been revised as of April 2011, to correct grammar and spelling errors.
author: R. M. Mendez
